name: FlappyCarl
description:
Flappy Carl is a realistic Carl survival simulator that truly speaks about the nature of our exsistance and our distructive nature.

"Holy crap this is so freakin epic" -Peter Griffin 10/10
"I feel personally attacked" -Master Shake 10/10
"Before I played this I was about to die from a terminal illness but right when I launched the game my doctor told me I only have 5 days to live" -Engineer 10/10
